articles.title: CAF Champions League final: Percy Tau named in Al Ahly squad - The South African
articles.description: Al Ahly coach Pitso Mosimane has named his 28-man squad for Monday's CAF Champions League final against Wydad Athletic Club.
articles.content:
Al Ahly coach Pitso Mosimane has named his 28-man squad for Monday’s CAF Champions League final against Wydad Athletic Club.
Kick-off is at 21:00 (SA time).

articles.title: Everyone but the Guptas is feeling the heat on State Ca... - Daily Maverick
articles.description: South Africa has upped the ante on State Capture prosecutions. Gupta fingerprints are all over the proverbial State Capture crime scene. But for now, it is their henchmen, enablers and former business partners taking the rap.
articles.content: While authorities ponder extradition options to smoke the Guptas out of their international hideout, the controversial brothers and Salim Essa the unofficial fourth brother remain conspicuous in thei… [+10650 chars]

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Drama as Mamelodi Sundowns complete South African clean sweep - EWN
articles.description: Mamelodi Sundowns completed a clean sweep of South African trophies this season after defeating Marumo Gallants 2-1 in the FA Cup final on Saturday thanks to a 120th-minute Thapelo Morena goal.
articles.content:
Mamelodi Sundowns completed a clean sweep of South African trophies this season after defeating Marumo Gallants 2-1 in the FA Cup final on Saturday thanks to a 120th-minute Thapelo Morena goal.
